name: Wellerman
description:
Journal of Tomas Hawkins

Captain of The Wellerman.

Starting date 19th April 1803.

These records and names are fictitious but represent true events that happened in the Tasman Sea and Southern Ocean between 1800 and 1840. The names of the places are based on what our intrepid captain might have called them and do not reflect modern or ancient names.

I do hope you enjoy my entry into the The Historically Accurate Game Jam 5: "Your Country's History"

-iAmStos
